reporting.reporttable.TableQuery:
IF @FromDate <= @ToDate BEGIN SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'hour');
SELECT [Date] AS '{$ecommerce.report_hour$}', CAST(SUM(ISNULL(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency,0)) AS DECIMAL(38,1)) AS '{$com.sales.volumeofsales$}' FROM {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'hour') AS Dates LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON ([Date] <= OrderDate AND DATEADD(HOUR,1,[Date]) > OrderDate) AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID GROUP BY [Date] ORDER BY [Date] DESC END
